page.title: 05GAMES ON THE PLAYGROUND.
page.content:
Here are some games we play at breaktimes:
{Hide and Seek} When I play hide and seek somebody is 'on it'. They have to count to 100. Meanwhile the players run and hide. When the one 'on it' has found us all we start another game.
{London} One person stands at the bottom of the yard and any number of people stand at the top of the yard. The person who is 'on it' turns around, hiding her eyes, and spells out { {L-O-N-D-O-N.}While this is going on the rest run and as soon as the person 'on it' turns round everyone has to stand as still as statues. If anyone is caught moving they are out.
